survey.title: How important are the different features?

pages.title: How important are the different features?

rows.text: Audio Quality: The sound of the audio is clear and not muffled
Video Quality: The image of the video is clear and not pixelated
Audio Consistancy: The audio is smooth and and not stuttering
Video Consistancy: The video plays smoothly and does not jitter
Audio-Video Syncronization: Audio and Video are in sync

questions.name: Textbox
questions.title: In 2-3 sentences, why do you choose this way?
